prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Reed, Brass, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Brass, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, Reed, Brass, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are included in this song, which is made up of Piano, Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Brass.
